title: Diamond Vanki Pendant - A Timeless Treasure
features: This exquisite vanki pendant features an intricate floral and geometric design meticulously set with dazzling round brilliant cut diamonds. The rose gold provides a warm contrast, enhancing the brilliance of the diamonds. It's a modern interpretation of the traditional 'Vanki' armlet design, now reimagined as a pendant. This piece showcases a delicate filigree work, creating a light and airy feel.
occasions: or as an everyday statement piece.
description: A modern twist on a classic South Indian design, this vanki pendant combines the elegance of diamonds with the warmth of rose gold. Its versatile design allows it to be paired with both traditional and contemporary outfits. The high-quality diamonds and Hyderabadi polish ensure a lasting brilliance and exceptional finish.
